content: bag charms are back in a big way baby or in this case a little way baby knit your own little sweater charm & identify yourself as a knitter with their finger on the pulse of contemporary trends <3 seamlessly knit from the top down the boxy shape of this sweater allows for more room to embellish your project with duplicate stitch embroidery bead work etc gauge is not particularly important for this project techniques used long tail cast on 1x1 ribbing kfb increase bind off knitwise notions and materials * size us 1 2 25mm 32 or longer circular needle for magic loop * 35 yards 32 meters of fingering weight yarn * 4 stitch markers 1 unique for bor * darning needle to weave in ends * ~3 inches 8cm of 1/4 wide ribbon * sewing needle and thread * key ring and clasp optional for attaching your sweater to bags/keychains/belt loops this pattern has not been tech edited please reach out if you have questions and i will do my best to assist you i would love to see your finished projects on ravelry or instagram @oldehoeft
